data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Identify two different university engineering programs, preferably at different schools. Research ____ admission ____ and ____ classes ____ would ____ expected ____ take ____ the ____ two ____ of ____ program. How ____ of ____ courses ____ math, science, and ____ courses? See if you can identify the courses in each of these areas.
data.partBlankContent: Identify two different university engineering programs, preferably at different schools. Research t__ admission requir______ and t__ classes y__ would b_ expected t_ take i_ the fi___ two ye___ of t__ program. How ma__ of th___ courses a__ math, science, and engin______ courses? See if you can identify the courses in each of these areas.
data.fullContent: Identify two different university engineering programs, preferably at different schools. Research the admission requirements and the classes you would be expected to take in the first two years of the program. How many of these courses are math, science, and engineering courses? See if you can identify the courses in each of these areas.
data.answer: 确定两个不同的大学工程项目，最好是在不同的学校。研究一下入学要求，以及你希望在前两年学习的课程。这些课程中有多少是数学、科学和工程课程?看看你是否能在这些领域中找到课程。
